page.title: 17THE YOUNG FARMERS CLUB
page.content: I have been a member of the Rushbury & Cardington Young Farmers{club}for 13 years,and during that time I have done various activities.These range from cookery contests to playing hockey for the Shropshire Federation "B"team.In addition I have also helped to repair and repaint the club room and cut the grass in the local church-yard.The style of the club has changed since it first started,but the aim is still the same,to have fun.There are many offices and posts to be held in the club,and these help young people become more self-confident nnd assist them to meet and overcome new {challenges.}The posts include chairman secretary and their assistants,sports officers,social secretary and stock judging officer. We try to promote the Young Farmers movement and create comradeship in a rural community.
